attributes.action: Give all NHS workers a fair pay deal.
attributes.background: Reconsider it’s shamefully low 1% increase for all NHS workers and properly reward them with a minimum 12.5% pay rise for there extraordinary heroic efforts. Many of the staff have suffered stress and mental health issues in addition to relentless exhaustion which will sadly be ongoing.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151
